message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price of $120. I think you'll really love it, and I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within a lower budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $100?

Hi Bob, I understand that you're looking to keep your spending within a budget, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer the product to you for $110. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a great deal for you. What do you think?
